trans-unit.source: These properties affect the position of the current item when the view is scrolled. For example, if the currently selected item should stay in the middle of the view when it is scrolled, set the preferredHighlightBegin and preferredHighlightEnd values to the top and bottom coordinates of where the middle item would be. If the currentItem is changed programmatically, the view will automatically scroll so that the current item is in the middle of the view. Furthermore, the behavior of the current item index will occur whether or not a highlight exists.
trans-unit.target: 当滚动视图时，这些属性会影响当前项目的位置。例如，如果当前选定的项目在滚动时应停留在视图的中间，则将 preferredHighlightBegin 和 preferredHighlightEnd 值设置为中间项目所在位置的顶部和底部坐标。如果以编程方式更改 currentItem ，则视图将自动滚动，以使当前项目位于视图的中间。此外，无论是否存在突出显示，都会发生当前项目索引的行为。

trans-unit.source: These properties allow the item to determine if it is the first or last item in the positioner, respectively.

trans-unit.target: 如果可翻转视图分别位于开头或结尾,这些属性为真。

trans-unit.source: These properties can be combined to produce a variety of layouts, as shown in the table below. The GridViews in the first row all have a flow value of GridView.FlowLeftToRight, but use different combinations of horizontal and vertical layout directions (specified by layoutDirection and verticalLayoutDirection respectively). Similarly, the GridViews in the second row below all have a flow value of GridView.FlowTopToBottom, but use different combinations of horizontal and vertical layout directions to lay out their items in different ways.
trans-unit.target: 可以组合这些属性以产生各种布局，如下表所示。第一行中的GridView的流值均为GridView .FlowLeftToRight，但使用水平和垂直布局方向的不同组合（分别由layoutDirection和verticalLayoutDirection指定）。同样，下面第二行中的GridView的流值均为GridView .FlowTopToBottom，但是使用水平和垂直布局方向的不同组合以不同的方式布置其项目。

Similarly, the GridViews in the second row below all have a flow value of GridView.FlowTopToBottom, but use different combinations of horizontal and vertical layout directions to lay out their items in different ways.

trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义了模糊方向中心点的像素偏移量。

trans-unit.source: These properties define the center and focal points. To specify a simple radial gradient, set focalX and focalY to the value of centerX and centerY, respectively.

trans-unit.source: These properties define the center and focal radius. For simple radial gradients, focalRadius should be set to 0 (the default value).
trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义中心和焦距。对于简单的径向渐变，应该将focusRadius设置为 0 （默认值）。

trans-unit.source: These properties define the center point of the conical gradient.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义了锥形梯度的中心点。

trans-unit.source: These properties define the offset in pixels for the perceived center point of the rotation.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义了旋转中心点的像素偏移量。

trans-unit.source: These properties define the preferred range of the highlight (for the current item) within the view. The preferredHighlightBegin value must be less than the preferredHighlightEnd value.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义视图中突出显示（针对当前项目）的首选范围。该 preferredHighlightBegin 值必须小于 preferredHighlightEnd 值。

trans-unit.source: These properties define the start and end points between which color interpolation occurs. By default both points are set to (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: 这些属性定义了颜色插值发生的起始点和结束点。默认情况下,这两个点都被设置为(0,0)。

trans-unit.source: These properties describe the position and size of the currently viewed area. The size is defined as the percentage of the full view currently visible, scaled to 0.0 - 1.0. The page position is usually in the range 0.0 (beginning) to 1.0 minus size ratio (end), i.e. yPosition is in the range 0.0 to 1.0-heightRatio. However, it is possible for the contents to be dragged outside of the normal range, resulting in the page positions also being outside the normal range.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性描述了当前查看区域的位置和大小。大小定义为当前可见的全视图的百分比，缩放为0.0-1.0。页面位置通常在0.0（开始）到1.0减去尺寸比（结束）的范围内，即 yPosition 在0.0到1.0- heightRatio 的范围内。但是，有可能将内容拖动到正常范围之外，从而导致页面位置也超出正常范围。

trans-unit.source: These properties describe whether the view is currently moving horizontally, vertically or in either direction, due to the user dragging the view.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性描述了当前视图是否由于用户拖动视图而在水平、垂直或任一方向上移动。

trans-unit.source: These properties describe whether the view is currently moving horizontally, vertically or in either direction, due to the user flicking the view.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性描述了由于用户轻触视图,视图当前是否在水平、垂直或任一方向上移动。

trans-unit.source: These tests are followed all the way up the parent window chain until one of the above rules is satisfied. If all else fails, a default menu bar will be created. The default menu bar on Qt is an empty menu bar. However, you can create a different default menu bar by creating a parentless QMenuBar. The first one created will be designated the default menu bar and will be used whenever a default menu bar is needed.

trans-unit.source: They may be useful when emulating language features in C++ requires the use of specialized exception types. In addition, they may help to more clearly communicate certain typical conditions, instead of throwing a generic JavaScript exception. For example, code that deals with networking and resource locators may find it useful to propagate errors related to malformed locators using the URIError type.
trans-unit.target: 当模拟C++中的语言特性需要使用专门的异常类型时,它们可能很有用。此外,它们可能有助于更清楚地传达某些典型的条件,而不是抛出一个通用的JavaScript异常。例如,处理网络和资源定位器的代码可能会发现,使用URIError类型传播与畸形定位器相关的错误是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This API supports two types of roaming. Application level roaming (ALR) provides the most control over the process. Applications will be notified about upcoming link layer changes and get the opportunity to test the new access point. Eventually they can reject or accept the link layer change. The second form of roaming is referred to as Forced Roaming. The system simply changes the link layer without consulting the application. It is up to the application to detect that some of its internal socket may have become invalid. As a consequence it has to reinitialize those sockets and reestablish the previous user session without any interruption. Forced roaming has the advantage that applications don't have to manage the entire roaming process by themselves.
trans-unit.target: 该API支持两种类型的漫游。应用层漫游(ALR)提供了最多的过程控制。应用程序将被通知即将到来的链路层变化,并获得测试新接入点的机会。最终他们可以拒绝或接受链路层变化。第二种形式的漫游被称为强制漫游。系统只是简单地改变链路层,而不咨询应用程序。应用程序要检测到它的一些内部套接字可能已经失效。因此,它必须重新初始化这些套接字,并在没有任何中断的情况下重新建立以前的用户会话。强制漫游的优点是应用程序不必自己管理整个漫游过程。

trans-unit.source: This approach is different from rendering shapes via QQuickPaintedItem or the 2D Canvas because the path never gets rasterized in software. Therefore Shape is suitable for creating shapes spreading over larger areas of the screen, avoiding the performance penalty for texture uploads or framebuffer blits. In addition, the declarative API allows manipulating, binding to, and even animating the path element properties like starting and ending position, the control points, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法与通过QQuickPaintedItem或2D Canvas 渲染形状不同，因为路径永远不会在软件中栅格化。因此，Shape适用于创建散布在屏幕较大区域的形状，从而避免了纹理上载或帧缓冲区模糊带来的性能损失。另外，声明性API允许操作，绑定甚至对路径元素属性（例如起点和终点位置，控制点等）进行动画处理。

trans-unit.source: This attached property controls the maximum height of the split item. The preferredHeight is bound within the minimumHeight and maximumHeight. A split item cannot be dragged to be larger than its maximumHeight.

trans-unit.source: This attached property controls the preferred height of the split item. The preferred height will be used as the size of the item, and will be bound within the minimumHeight and maximumHeight. If the preferred height is not set, the item's implicitHeight will be used.

trans-unit.source: This attribute is no longer fully supported in Qt 5. It ensures that widgets are created as soon as they are constructed. By default, resources for widgets are allocated on demand to improve efficiency and minimize resource usage. Setting or clearing this attribute affects widgets constructed after the change. Setting it tells Qt to create toplevel windows immediately. Therefore, if it is important to minimize resource consumption, do not set this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性在Qt 5中不再完全支持,它确保了widget在构造完成后立即被创建。默认情况下,widget 的资源是按需分配的,以提高效率和减少资源使用。设置或清除此属性会影响改变后构建的widgets。设置它会告诉Qt立即创建toplevel窗口。因此,如果需要尽量减少资源消耗,请不要设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is only required to be set on Linux/BlueZ systems with older Linux kernels (v3.3 or lower), or if CAP_NET_ADMIN is not set for the executable. The default value of the attribute is RandomAddress.
trans-unit.target: 仅在具有较旧Linux内核（v3.3或更低版本）的Linux / BlueZ系统上，或者未为可执行文件设置CAP_NET_ADMIN时，才需要设置此属性。该属性的默认值是RandomAddress。

trans-unit.source: This authentication mechanism currently supports no incoming or outgoing options.

This automatic rotation of the axes is handy is some usecases, for example in a bubble level application that measures how level a surface is by looking at the X axis value of an accelerometer. When the device and screen orientation change by 90 degrees, an application developer does not need to change anything, he can continue using the X axis value even though the device is rotated. Without automatic axes orientation, the application developer would need to look at the Y values instead, thereby adding code to the application that reads from a different axis depending on the screen orientation.
trans-unit.target: 这种自动旋转轴的功能在某些情况下非常方便,例如在一个气泡水平仪应用中,通过查看加速度计的X轴值来测量表面的水平度。当设备和屏幕方向发生90度变化时,应用程序开发人员不需要改变任何东西,他可以继续使用X轴值,即使设备被旋转。如果没有自动的轴方向,应用开发者就需要看Y轴值来代替,从而在应用中添加代码,根据屏幕方向从不同的轴读取。

This can be a constraint for embedded devices. In multi-process, each client needs to have its own graphics buffer, which it sends to the compositor. Consequently, you use more video memory compared to the single-process case: where everything is drawn at once and there is no need to store the different parts in intermediary buffers.

This can be used to attach meta-data to the message. The field name should consist of a domain prefix (possibly the conventional file extension of the file format the field is inspired by), a hyphen and the actual field name in underscore-delimited notation. For storage in TS files, the field name together with the prefix "extra-" will form an XML element name. The field contents will be XML-escaped, but otherwise appear verbatim as the element's contents. Any number of unique fields can be added to each message.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用来给消息附加元数据。字段名应该由一个域前缀(可能是字段所受启发的文件格式的常规文件扩展名)、一个连字符和以下划线分隔的实际字段名组成。对于TS文件的存储,字段名与前缀 "extra-"一起将形成一个XML元素名。字段的内容将被XML格式化,但在其他方面则与元素的内容一样逐字显示。每个消息可以添加任意数量的唯一字段。

trans-unit.source: This chapter describes how to set up qmake project files for three common project types that are based on Qt: application, library, and plugin. Although all project types use many of the same variables, each of them uses project-specific variables to customize output files.
trans-unit.target: 本章介绍了如何为基于Qt的三种常见项目类型设置qmake项目文件:应用程序、库和插件。尽管所有的项目类型都使用了许多相同的变量,但它们中的每一个都使用了项目专用的变量来定制输出文件。

trans-unit.source: This chapter describes most of the common editing operations that you will need to perform using a cursor, from basic insertion of text and document elements to more complex manipulation of document structures.
trans-unit.target: 本章介绍了大部分常用的编辑操作,从基本的文本和文档元素的插入,到更复杂的文档结构操作,您都需要使用光标来执行。

trans-unit.source: This chapter discusses different approaches and options available for implementing right-to-left language support for Qt Quick applications. Some common right-to-left languages include Arabic, Hebrew, Persian and Urdu. Most changes include making sure that text translated to right-to-left languages is properly aligned to the right, and horizontally ordered content in views, lists and grids flows correctly from the right to left.
trans-unit.target: 本章讨论了为Qt Quick应用程序实现从右到左的语言支持的不同方法和选项。一些常见的从右到左的语言包括阿拉伯语、希伯来语、波斯语和乌尔都语。大多数变化包括确保翻译成右向左语言的文本正确地向右对齐,以及视图、列表和网格中的水平排序内容正确地从右向左流动。

trans-unit.source: This chapter shows how to combine basic C++ with the functionality provided by Qt to create a few small graphical interface (GUI) applications.
trans-unit.target: 本章介绍了如何将基本的C++与Qt提供的功能相结合,创建一些小型的图形界面(GUI)应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic describes the available features in the BodyCompositionMeasurement characteristic.

trans-unit.source: This characteristic describes the body composition such as muscle percentage or the body water mass.
trans-unit.target: 这个特征描述了身体的组成,如肌肉比例或身体的水分质量。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic exposes the UV index.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性暴露了UV指数。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic exposes the lowest heart rate a user can reach.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性暴露了用户可以达到的最低心率。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic exposes the maximum Oxygen uptake of a user.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性暴露了用户的最大摄氧量。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic exposes the maximum recommended heart rate that limits exertion.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性暴露了限制用力的最大推荐心率。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic exposes the rainfall in meters.
trans-unit.target: 该特性显示了以米为单位的降雨量。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic exposes the trend the barometric pressure is taking.
trans-unit.target: 这一特性暴露了气压的变化趋势。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic exposes the user's first name.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性暴露了用户的名字。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic exposes the user's weight in kilograms.
trans-unit.target: 该特性以公斤为单位暴露了用户的体重。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic has the same format as the Blood Pressure Measurement characteristic.
trans-unit.target: 该特性与血压测量特性的格式相同。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic is related to the Environmental Sensing Service.
trans-unit.target: 这一特点与环境感知处有关。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic is used to preset the various Aerobic and Anaerobic threshold characteristics based on the to-be-performed sport type.
trans-unit.target: 此特性用于根据要执行的运动类型预设各种有氧和无氧阈值特性。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic provides a heat index in degree Celsius.
trans-unit.target: 该特性提供了一个以摄氏度为单位的热指数。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic provides weight related data such as BMI or the user's weight.
trans-unit.target: 该特性提供与体重相关的数据,如BMI或用户的体重。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic shows how many numbers of unread alerts exist in the specific category in the device.
trans-unit.target: 该特性显示设备中特定类别中存在多少未读警报的数量。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the age of the user.
trans-unit.target: 这个特征说明了用户的年龄。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the dew point in degree Celsius.
trans-unit.target: 该特性以摄氏度为单位说明露点。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the email of the user.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性说明了用户的电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the first metabolic threshold.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性说明了第一个代谢阈值。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the index of the user.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性说明了用户的指数。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the magnetic flux density on an x and y axis.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性说明了X轴和Y轴上的磁通密度。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the magnetic flux density on an x, y and z axis.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性说明了X、Y、Z轴上的磁通密度。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the maximum heart rate a user can reach in beats per minute.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性说明了用户可以达到的最大心率,单位是每分钟心跳。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the power of electromagnetic radiation in watt per square meter.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性说明了电磁辐射的功率,单位是瓦特/平方米。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the second metabolic threshold.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性说明了第二个代谢阈值。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the user's date of birth.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性说明了用户的出生日期。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the user's gender.
trans-unit.target: 这个特征说明了用户的性别。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the user's height.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性说明了用户的身高。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the user's hip circumference in meters.
trans-unit.target: 该特性表示用户的臀围,单位为米。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the user's last name.
trans-unit.target: 这个特性说明了用户的姓氏。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the user's waist circumference in meters.
trans-unit.target: 该特性表示用户的腰围,单位为米。

trans-unit.source: This characteristic states the wind chill in degree Celsius
trans-unit.target: 该特性表示以摄氏度为单位的风寒。

trans-unit.source: This class (in combination with QCameraFocusZone) can expose information on what parts of the camera sensor image are in focus or are being used for autofocusing via the focusZones() property:
trans-unit.target: 此类（与QCameraFocusZone结合使用）可以通过focusZones（）属性公开有关相机传感器图像的哪些部分已对焦或正在用于自动对焦的信息：

trans-unit.source: This class acts as a bridge between the UI and the input method that provides the data for selection lists.
trans-unit.target: 该类作为UI和输入方法之间的桥梁,为选择列表提供数据。

trans-unit.source: This class acts as a container for single candlestick items. Each item is drawn to its own category when using QBarCategoryAxis. QDateTimeAxis and QValueAxis can be used as alternatives to QBarCategoryAxis. In this case, each candlestick item is drawn according to its timestamp value.
trans-unit.target: 此类充当单个烛台项目的容器。使用QBarCategoryAxis时，每个项目都绘制到自己的类别。QDateTimeAxis和QValueAxis可以用来替代QBarCategoryAxis。在这种情况下，每个烛台项目均根据其时间戳值绘制。

trans-unit.source: This class allows an application to embed a toolbar in the thumbnail of a window, which is shown when hovering over its taskbar icon. It provides quick access to the window's commands without requiring the user to restore or activate the window.
trans-unit.target: 该类允许应用程序在窗口的缩略图中嵌入一个工具栏,当鼠标悬停在其任务栏图标上时就会显示。它提供了对窗口命令的快速访问,而不需要用户恢复或激活窗口。

trans-unit.source: This class allows several methods of accessing the elements of a container held within a QVariant. An instance of QSequentialIterable can be extracted from a QVariant if it can be converted to a QVariantList.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了几种方法来访问QVariant中保存的容器的元素。的一个实例QSequentialIterable可以从被提取的QVariant，如果它可以被转换成QVariantList。

trans-unit.source: This class allows several methods of accessing the elements of a container held within a QVariant. An instance of QSequentialIterable can be extracted from a QVariant if it can be converted to a QVariantList.

This class allows several methods of accessing the elements of an associative container held within a QVariant. An instance of QAssociativeIterable can be extracted from a QVariant if it can be converted to a QVariantHash or QVariantMap.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了几种方法来访问QVariant中保存的关联容器的元素。如果可以将QAssociativeIterable实例转换为QVariantHash或QVariantMap，则可以从QVariant中提取该实例。

trans-unit.source: This class allows several methods of accessing the elements of an associative container held within a QVariant. An instance of QAssociativeIterable can be extracted from a QVariant if it can be converted to a QVariantHash or QVariantMap.

This class allows you to play uncompressed audio files (typically WAV files) in a generally lower latency way, and is suitable for "feedback" type sounds in response to user actions (e.g. virtual keyboard sounds, positive or negative feedback for popup dialogs, or game sounds). If low latency is not important, consider using the QMediaPlayer class instead, since it supports a wider variety of media formats and is less resource intensive.
trans-unit.target: 此类允许您以通常较低的延迟方式播放未压缩的音频文件（通常是WAV文件），并且适合响应用户操作（例如虚拟键盘声音，弹出对话框的正反馈或负反馈）的“反馈”型声音。游戏声音）。如果低延迟并不重要，请考虑改用QMediaPlayer类，因为它支持更多种媒体格式，并且资源占用较少。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to decode a stream of CBOR content directly from either a QByteArray or a QIODevice. CBOR is the Concise Binary Object Representation, a very compact form of binary data encoding that is compatible with JSON. It was created by the IETF Constrained RESTful Environments (CoRE) WG, which has used it in many new RFCs. It is meant to be used alongside the CoAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于直接从QByteArray或QIODevice解码CBOR内容流。 CBOR是简洁的二进制对象表示形式，它是一种非常紧凑的二进制数据编码形式，与JSON兼容。它是由IETF约束RESTful环境（CoRE）工作组创建的，该工作组已在许多新的RFC中使用了它。它旨在与CoAP协议一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to discover Classic and Low Energy Bluetooth devices. The individual device type can be determined via the QBluetoothDeviceInfo::coreConfigurations() attribute. In most cases the list returned by discoveredDevices() contains both types of devices. However not every platform can detect both types of devices. On platforms with this limitation (for example iOS only suports Low Energy discovery), the discovery process will limit the search to the type which is supported.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于发现经典和低能耗蓝牙设备。可以通过QBluetoothDeviceInfo :: coreConfigurations（）属性确定各个设备的类型。在大多数情况下，discoveredDevices（）返回的列表包含两种类型的设备。但是，并非每个平台都能检测到两种类型的设备。在具有此限制的平台上（例如，iOS仅支持低能耗发现），发现过程会将搜索限制为受支持的类型。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to explain the underlying data by adding labeled categories. Unlike QBarCategoryAxis, QCategoryAxis allows the widths of the category ranges to be specified freely.
trans-unit.target: 此类可以通过添加带标签的类别来解释基础数据。与QBarCategoryAxis不同，QCategoryAxis允许自由指定类别范围的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to explain the underlying data by adding labeled categories. Unlike QBarCategoryAxis, QCategoryAxis allows the widths of the category ranges to be specified freely.

This class can be used to hold an associative container in CBOR, a map between a key and a value type. CBOR is the Concise Binary Object Representation, a very compact form of binary data encoding that is a superset of JSON. It was created by the IETF Constrained RESTful Environments (CoRE) WG, which has used it in many new RFCs. It is meant to be used alongside the CoAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于在CBOR中保存关联容器，CBOR是键和值类型之间的映射。CBOR是简洁二进制对象表示形式，它是二进制数据编码的非常紧凑的形式，是JSON的超集。它是由IETF约束RESTful环境（CoRE）工作组创建的，该工作组已在许多新的RFC中使用了它。它旨在与CoAP协议一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to hold one of the many types available in CBOR. CBOR is the Concise Binary Object Representation, a very compact form of binary data encoding that is a superset of JSON. It was created by the IETF Constrained RESTful Environments (CoRE) WG, which has used it in many new RFCs. It is meant to be used alongside the CoAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于保存CBOR中可用的多种类型之一。CBOR是简洁二进制对象表示形式，它是二进制数据编码的非常紧凑的形式，是JSON的超集。它是由IETF约束RESTful环境（CoRE）工作组创建的，该工作组已在许多新的RFC中使用了它。它旨在与CoAP协议一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to hold one sequential container in CBOR (an array). CBOR is the Concise Binary Object Representation, a very compact form of binary data encoding that is a superset of JSON. It was created by the IETF Constrained RESTful Environments (CoRE) WG, which has used it in many new RFCs. It is meant to be used alongside the CoAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于在CBOR（数组）中保存一个顺序容器。CBOR是简洁二进制对象表示形式，它是二进制数据编码的非常紧凑的形式，是JSON的超集。它是由IETF约束RESTful环境（CoRE）工作组创建的，该工作组已在许多新的RFC中使用了它。它旨在与CoAP协议一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to quickly encode a stream of CBOR content directly to either a QByteArray or QIODevice. CBOR is the Concise Binary Object Representation, a very compact form of binary data encoding that is compatible with JSON. It was created by the IETF Constrained RESTful Environments (CoRE) WG, which has used it in many new RFCs. It is meant to be used alongside the CoAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 此类可用于快速将CBOR内容流直接编码为QByteArray或QIODevice。CBOR是简洁的二进制对象表示形式，它是一种非常紧凑的二进制数据编码形式，与JSON兼容。它是由IETF约束RESTful环境（CoRE）工作组创建的，该工作组已在许多新的RFC中使用了它。它旨在与CoAP协议一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to reference a surface buffer. As long as a reference to the buffer exists, it is owned by the compositor and the client cannot modify it.
trans-unit.target: 这个类可以用来引用一个表面缓冲区。只要存在对缓冲区的引用,它就归合成器所有,客户端不能修改它。

trans-unit.source: This class can then be registered as a QML type and used with Model.
This class collects a set of parameterless signals, and re-emits them with integer, string or widget parameters corresponding to the object that sent the signal.
trans-unit.target: 这个类收集了一组无参数的信号,并以整数、字符串或widget参数与发送信号的对象相对应,重新发送它们。

trans-unit.source: This class collects a set of parameterless signals, and re-emits them with integer, string or widget parameters corresponding to the object that sent the signal. Note that in most cases you can use lambdas for passing custom parameters to slots. This is less costly and will simplify the code.

This class combines a QQmlEngine and QQmlComponent to provide a convenient way to load a single QML file. It also exposes some central application functionality to QML, which a C++/QML hybrid application would normally control from C++.
trans-unit.target: 此类结合了QQmlEngine和QQmlComponent来提供方便的方式来加载单个QML文件。它还向QML公开了一些中央应用程序功能，而C ++ / QML混合应用程序通常会从C ++控制这些功能。

trans-unit.source: This class contains functions that provide simple interfaces to these services that indicate whether they succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 这个类包含了为这些服务提供简单接口的函数,这些接口指示这些服务是成功还是失败。

trans-unit.source: This class contains functions to query standard locations on the local filesystem, for common tasks such as user-specific directories or system-wide configuration directories.
trans-unit.target: 该类包含了查询本地文件系统标准位置的函数,用于查询用户特定目录或全系统配置目录等常见任务。

trans-unit.source: This class contains the information and API for HTML5 desktop and push notifications.
trans-unit.target: 该类包含HTML5桌面和推送通知的信息和API。

trans-unit.source: This class corresponds to a client connecting to the compositor using the Wayland protocol. It corresponds to the Wayland interface wl_client.
trans-unit.target: 该类对应于使用Wayland协议连接到合成器的客户端。它对应于Wayland接口wl_client。

trans-unit.source: This class defines parameters for DTLS cookie generator
trans-unit.target: 该类定义了DTLS cookie生成器的参数。

trans-unit.source: This class defines parameters for DTLS cookie generator. More...
trans-unit.target: 此类定义DTLS cookie生成器的参数。更多...

trans-unit.source: This class defines the standard interface that proxy models must use to be able to interoperate correctly with other model/view components. It is not supposed to be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: 该类定义了代理模型必须使用的标准接口,以便能够与其他模型/视图组件正确地互操作。它不应该被直接实例化。

trans-unit.source: This class describes the features that are supported by the DOM implementation. Currently the XML subset of DOM Level 1 and DOM Level 2 Core are supported.
trans-unit.target: 该类描述了DOM实现所支持的功能。目前支持DOM Level 1的XML子集和DOM Level 2 Core。

trans-unit.source: This class does not fully implement an item by itself; in particular, it does not implement boundingRect() and paint(), which are inherited by QGraphicsItem.
trans-unit.target: 此类本身无法完全实现项目。特别是，它不实现QGraphicsItem继承的boundingRect（）和paint（）。

trans-unit.source: This class does not have a public constructor. It can only be instantiated by using the dynamic QRemoteObjectNode::acquire method.
trans-unit.target: 此类没有公共构造函数。它只能使用动态QRemoteObjectNode :: acquire方法实例化。

trans-unit.source: This class does not offer any GUI components or functionality for indices or contents. If you need one of those use QHelpEngine instead.
trans-unit.target: 此类不为索引或内容提供任何GUI组件或功能。如果您需要其中之一，请改用QHelpEngine。

trans-unit.source: This class draws data as a series of horizontal bars grouped by category, with one bar per category from each bar set added to the series.
trans-unit.target: 该类将数据绘制成一系列按类别分组的水平条形图,每个条形图集中的每个类别有一个条形图添加到系列中。

trans-unit.source: This class draws data as a series of uniformly sized horizontally stacked bars, with one bar per category. Each bar set added to the series contributes a single segment to each stacked bar. The segment size corresponds to the percentage of the segment value compared with the total value of all segments in the stack. Bars with zero value are not drawn.
trans-unit.target: 该类将数据绘制成一系列大小均匀的水平堆叠条形图,每个类别有一个条形图。添加到系列中的每一个条形集都为每个堆叠的条形集贡献了一个单一的段。段的大小对应于段值与堆叠中所有段的总值的百分比。价值为零的条形图不被绘制。

trans-unit.source: This class draws data as a series of uniformly sized vertically stacked bars, with one bar per category. Each bar set added to the series contributes a single segment to each stacked bar. The segment size corresponds to the percentage of the segment value compared with the total value of all segments in the stack. Bars with zero value are not drawn.
trans-unit.target: 该类将数据绘制成一系列大小均匀的垂直堆叠的条形图,每个类别有一个条形图。每一个添加到系列中的条形图集都为每个堆叠的条形图贡献一个片段。段的大小对应于段值与堆叠中所有段的总值的百分比。价值为零的条形图不被绘制。

trans-unit.source: This class draws data as a series of vertical bars grouped by category, with one bar per category from each bar set added to the series.
trans-unit.target: 该类将数据绘制成一系列按类别分组的垂直条形图,每个条形图集中的每个类别有一个条形图添加到系列中。

trans-unit.source: This class enables developers to display SVG drawings alongside standard widgets, and is used in much the same way as QLabel is used for displaying text and bitmap images.
trans-unit.target: 此类使开发人员可以在标准小部件旁边显示SVG绘图，并且其使用方式与QLabel用于显示文本和位图图像的方式几乎相同。

trans-unit.source: This class enables developers to render 3D surface plots and to view them by rotating the scene freely. The visual properties of the surface such as draw mode and shading can be controlled via QSurface3DSeries.
trans-unit.target: 此类使开发人员可以渲染3D表面图并通过自由旋转场景来查看它们。可以通过QSurface3DSeries控制表面的视觉属性，例如绘制模式和阴影。

trans-unit.source: This class enables developers to render bar graphs in 3D and to view them by rotating the scene freely. Rotation is done by holding down the right mouse button and moving the mouse. Zooming is done by mouse wheel. Selection, if enabled, is done by left mouse button. The scene can be reset to default camera view by clicking mouse wheel. In touch devices rotation is done by tap-and-move, selection by tap-and-hold and zoom by pinch.
trans-unit.target: 该类使开发者能够在3D中渲染条形图,并通过自由旋转场景来查看。旋转是通过按住鼠标右键并移动鼠标来完成的。缩放是通过鼠标滚轮来完成的。如果启用了选择功能,则可通过鼠标左键进行选择。场景可以通过点击鼠标滚轮重置为默认的相机视图。在触摸设备中,旋转通过点击并移动来完成,选择通过点击并按住来完成,缩放通过捏住来完成。

trans-unit.source: This class enables developers to render scatter graphs in 3D and to view them by rotating the scene freely. Rotation is done by holding down the right mouse button and moving the mouse. Zooming is done by mouse wheel. Selection, if enabled, is done by left mouse button. The scene can be reset to default camera view by clicking mouse wheel. In touch devices rotation is done by tap-and-move, selection by tap-and-hold and zoom by pinch.
trans-unit.target: 该类使开发者能够在3D中渲染散点图,并通过自由旋转场景来查看。旋转是通过按住鼠标右键并移动鼠标来完成的。缩放由鼠标滚轮完成。如果启用了选择功能,则通过鼠标左键进行选择。场景可以通过点击鼠标滚轮重置为默认的相机视图。在触摸设备中,旋转是通过点击并移动来完成的,选择是通过点击并按住来完成的,缩放是通过捏住来完成的。

trans-unit.source: This class extends QTextEdit (in read-only mode), adding some navigation functionality so that users can follow links in hypertext documents.

trans-unit.source: This class gathers together the features of the specialized handler classes, making it a convenient starting point when implementing custom handlers for subclasses of QXmlReader, particularly QXmlSimpleReader. The virtual functions from each of the base classes are reimplemented in this class, providing sensible default behavior for many common cases. By subclassing this class, and overriding these functions, you can concentrate on implementing the parts of the handler relevant to your application.
trans-unit.target: 此类收集了专用处理程序类的功能，使它成为为QXmlReader的子类（尤其是QXmlSimpleReader）实现自定义处理程序时的方便起点。每个基类的虚函数都在该类中重新实现，从而为许多常见情况提供了明智的默认行为。通过对此类进行子类化并覆盖这些功能，您可以集中精力实现与应用程序相关的处理程序部分。

trans-unit.source: This class implements cookies as described by the initial cookie specification by Netscape, which is somewhat similar to the RFC 2109 specification, plus the "HttpOnly" extension. The more recent RFC 2965 specification (which uses the Set-Cookie2 header) is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现了Netscape最初的cookie规范所描述的cookie，该规范与RFC 2109规范有点相似，外加“ HttpOnly”扩展名。不支持更新的RFC 2965规范（使用Set-Cookie2标头）。

trans-unit.source: This class implements only the basic security recommended by the cookie specifications and does not implement any cookie acceptance policy (it accepts all cookies set by any requests). In order to override those rules, you should reimplement the cookiesForUrl() and setCookiesFromUrl() virtual functions. They are called by QNetworkReply and QNetworkAccessManager when they detect new cookies and when they require cookies.
trans-unit.target: 此类仅实现cookie规范建议的基本安全性，并且不实现任何cookie接受策略（它接受任何请求设置的所有cookie）。为了覆盖这些规则，您应该重新实现cookiesForUrl（）和setCookiesFromUrl（）虚拟函数。当它们检测到新的cookie并需要cookie时，它们将由QNetworkReply和QNetworkAccessManager调用。

trans-unit.source: This class implements support for the set of standard page sizes as defined in the Adobe Postscript PPD Standard v4.3. It defines the standard set of page sizes in points, millimeters and inches and ensures these sizes are consistently used. Other size units can be used but will be calculated results and so may not always be consistent. The defined point sizes are always a integer, all other sizes can be fractions of a unit.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了对Adobe Postscript PPD Standard v4.3中定义的标准页面尺寸集的支持。它定义了以点、毫米和英寸为单位的标准页面尺寸集,并确保这些尺寸被一致使用。可以使用其他尺寸单位,但会计算出结果,因此可能并不总是一致。定义的点尺寸总是一个整数,所有其他尺寸可以是单位的分数。

trans-unit.source: This class implements the Authorization Code Grant flow, which is used both to obtain and to refresh access tokens. It is a redirection-based flow so the user will need access to a web browser.

trans-unit.source: This class is designed to improve the performance of substring handling when manipulating substrings obtained from existing QString instances. QStringRef avoids the memory allocation and reference counting overhead of a standard QString by simply referencing a part of the original string. This can prove to be advantageous in low level code, such as that used in a parser, at the expense of potentially more complex code.
trans-unit.target: 此类设计用于改进在处理从现有QString实例获得的子字符串时的子字符串处理性能。QStringRef通过简单地引用原始字符串的一部分，避免了标准QString的内存分配和引用计数开销。在诸如解析器中使用的低级代码中，这可能被证明是有利的，但以可能更复杂的代码为代价。

trans-unit.source: This class is designed to improve the performance of substring handling when manipulating substrings obtained from existing QString instances. QStringRef avoids the memory allocation and reference counting overhead of a standard QString by simply referencing a part of the original string. This can prove to be advantageous in low level code, such as that used in a parser, at the expense of potentially more complex code.

trans-unit.target: 此类不能单独使用。相反，它用于派生其他复杂的控件选项，例如QStyleOptionSlider和QStyleOptionSpinBox。

trans-unit.source: This class is often used for optimization purposes, as it allows you to defer an expensive operation until after all the properties have been set on an object. For example, QML's Text element uses the parser status to defer text layout until all of its properties have been set (we don't want to layout when the text is assigned, and then relayout when the font is assigned, and relayout again when the width is assigned, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 此类通常用于优化目的，因为它允许您将昂贵的操作推迟到对一个对象设置了所有属性之后。例如，QML的Text元素使用解析器状态来延迟文本布局，直到设置了其所有属性为止（我们不希望在分配 text 时进行布局，然后在分配 font 时重新布局，而在分配字体时重新布局）。 width ，依此类推）。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by non-GUI applications to provide their event loop. For non-GUI application that uses Qt, there should be exactly one QCoreApplication object. For GUI applications, see QGuiApplication. For applications that use the Qt Widgets module, see QApplication.

trans-unit.source: This class is used by non-GUI applications to provide their event loop. For non-GUI application that uses Qt, there should be exactly one QCoreApplication object. For GUI applications, see QGuiApplication. For applications that use the Qt Widgets module, see QApplication.

This class is used by the QWebEnginePage::quotaRequested() signal to accept() or reject() a request for an increase in the persistent storage allocated to the application. The default quota is 0 bytes.
trans-unit.target: QWebEnginePage :: quotaRequested（）信号使用此类来接受（）或拒绝（）请求增加分配给该应用程序的持久性存储。默认配额为0字节。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to construct horizontal box layout objects. See QBoxLayout for details.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于构造水平框布局对象。有关详细信息，请参见QBoxLayout。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to construct vertical box layout objects. See QBoxLayout for details.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于构造垂直框布局对象。有关详细信息，请参见QBoxLayout。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to describe an option on the command line. It allows different ways of defining the same option with multiple aliases possible. It is also used to describe how the option is used - it may be a flag (e.g. -v) or take a value (e.g. -o file).
trans-unit.target: 此类用于描述命令行上的选项。它允许使用不同的方式定义具有多个别名的相同选项。它还用于描述选项的使用方式-它可以是一个标志（例如 -v ）或一个值（例如 -o file ）。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to render wl_shell, xdg_shell or ivi_application surfaces as part of a Qt Quick scene. It handles moving and resizing triggered by clicking on the window decorations.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于渲染 wl_shell ， xdg_shell 或 ivi_application 表面，作为Qt Quick场景的一部分。它可以处理通过单击窗口装饰触发的移动和调整大小。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to represent schemas that conform to the XML Schema 1.0 specification.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于表示符合XML Schema 1.0规范的架构。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to show simple animations without sound. If you want to display video and media content, use the Qt Multimedia multimedia framework instead.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于显示没有声音的简单动画。如果要显示视频和媒体内容，请改用Qt Multimedia多媒体框架。

trans-unit.source: This class is used with QAccessible::updateAccessibility().
trans-unit.target: 此类与QAccessible :: updateAccessibility（）一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This class is used with QAccessible::updateAccessibility().

This class is useful when you have a sequence of QChars that you want to repeatedly match against some strings (perhaps in a loop), or when you want to search for the same sequence of characters multiple times in the same string. Using a matcher object and indexIn() is faster than matching a plain QString with QString::indexOf() if repeated matching takes place. This class offers no benefit if you are doing one-off string matches.
trans-unit.target: 当您具有要与某些字符串重复匹配的QChar序列（也许在循环中）时，或者要在同一字符串中多次搜索相同的字符序列时，此类非常有用。如果进行重复匹配，则使用匹配器对象和indexIn（）比将普通QString与QString :: indexOf（）匹配要快。如果您要进行一次性字符串匹配，则该类没有任何好处。

trans-unit.source: This class is useful when you have a sequence of bytes that you want to repeatedly match against some byte arrays (perhaps in a loop), or when you want to search for the same sequence of bytes multiple times in the same byte array. Using a matcher object and indexIn() is faster than matching a plain QByteArray with QByteArray::indexOf() if repeated matching takes place. This class offers no benefit if you are doing one-off byte array matches.
trans-unit.target: 当您有一个要与某些字节数组重复匹配的字节序列（也许是在循环中），或者要在同一字节数组中多次搜索相同的字节序列时，此类很有用。如果进行重复匹配，则使用匹配器对象和indexIn（）比将普通QByteArray与QByteArray :: indexOf（）匹配要快。如果您要进行一次性字节数组匹配，则该类没有任何好处。

trans-unit.source: This class is useful when you have a sequence of bytes that you want to repeatedly match against some byte arrays (perhaps in a loop), or when you want to search for the same sequence of bytes multiple times in the same byte array. Using a matcher object and indexIn() is faster than matching a plain QByteArray with QByteArray::indexOf(), in particular if repeated matching takes place.
trans-unit.target: 当您有一个要与某些字节数组重复匹配的字节序列（也许是在循环中），或者要在同一字节数组中多次搜索相同的字节序列时，此类很有用。使用匹配器对象和indexIn（）比将普通QByteArray与QByteArray :: indexOf（）匹配要快，特别是如果发生重复匹配。

trans-unit.source: This class makes it possible to accept incoming TCP connections. You can specify the port or have QTcpServer pick one automatically. You can listen on a specific address or on all the machine's addresses.
trans-unit.target: 此类可以接受传入的TCP连接。您可以指定端口或让QTcpServer自动选择一个。您可以侦听特定地址或所有机器的地址。

trans-unit.source: This class makes it possible to accept incoming TCP connections. You can specify the port or have QTcpServer pick one automatically. You can listen on a specific address or on all the machine's addresses.
This class makes it possible to accept incoming local socket connections.
trans-unit.target: 该类可以接受传入的本地套接字连接。

trans-unit.source: This class manages the series specific visual elements, as well as the series data (via a data proxy).
trans-unit.target: 该类管理系列特定的视觉元素,以及系列数据(通过数据代理)。

trans-unit.source: This class may internally utilize QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent to find unknown devices.
trans-unit.target: 此类可以在内部利用QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent查找未知设备。

trans-unit.source: This class must be overridden to provide an implementation for saving (QRemoteObjectAbstractPersistedStore::saveProperties) and restoring (QRemoteObjectAbstractPersistedStore::restoreProperties) PROP values. The derived type can then be set for a node, and any replica acquired from that node will then automatically store PERSISTED properties when the replica destructor is called, and retrieve the values when the replica is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 必须重写此类，以提供用于保存（QRemoteObjectAbstractPersistedStore :: saveProperties）和还原（QRemoteObjectAbstractPersistedStore :: restoreProperties）PROP值的实现。然后可以为节点设置派生类型，并且从该节点获取的任何副本将在调用副本析构函数时自动存储PERSISTED属性，并在实例化副本时检索值。

trans-unit.source: This class provides a stateless calculator for time zone conversions between UTC and the local time in a specific time zone. By default it uses the host system time zone data to perform these conversions.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了一个无状态的计算器,用于在特定时区的UTC和当地时间之间进行时区转换。默认情况下,它使用主机系统的时区数据来执行这些转换。

trans-unit.source: This class provides access to the QTextDocument of QQuickTextEdit elements. This is provided to allow usage of the Rich Text Processing functionalities of Qt. You are not allowed to modify the document, but it can be used to output content, for example with QTextDocumentWriter), or provide additional formatting, for example with QSyntaxHighlighter.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供对QQuickTextEdit元素的QTextDocument的访问。提供此功能是为了允许使用Qt 的RTF处理功能。您不允许修改文档，但是可以使用它来输出内容（例如，使用QTextDocumentWriter），或提供其他格式（例如，使用QSyntaxHighlighter）。

trans-unit.source: This class provides access to the keyboard device in a QWaylandSeat. It corresponds to the Wayland interface wl_keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供对QWaylandSeat中的键盘设备的访问。它对应于Wayland接口wl_keyboard。

trans-unit.source: This class provides access to the local filesystem, providing functions for renaming and removing files and directories, and for creating new directories. In the simplest case, it can be used with a suitable display widget as part of a browser or filer.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了对本地文件系统的访问,提供了重命名、删除文件和目录以及创建新目录的功能。在最简单的情况下,它可以和一个合适的显示部件一起使用,作为浏览器或文件器的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This class provides access to the local filesystem, providing functions for renaming and removing files and directories, and for creating new directories. In the simplest case, it can be used with a suitable display widget as part of a browser or filter.
trans-unit.target: 该类提供了对本地文件系统的访问,提供了重命名、删除文件和目录以及创建新目录的功能。在最简单的情况下,它可以与一个合适的显示部件一起使用,作为浏览器或过滤器的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This class provides access to the pointer device in a QWaylandSeat. It corresponds to the Wayland interface wl_pointer.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供对QWaylandSeat中的指针设备的访问。它对应于Wayland接口wl_pointer。

trans-unit.source: This class provides access to the touch device in a QWaylandSeat. It corresponds to the Wayland interface wl_touch.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供对QWaylandSeat中的触摸设备的访问。它对应于Wayland接口wl_touch。

trans-unit.source: This class provides default implementations of the functions for painting item data in a view and editing data from item models. Default implementations of the paint() and sizeHint() virtual functions, defined in QAbstractItemDelegate, are provided to ensure that the delegate implements the correct basic behavior expected by views. You can reimplement these functions in subclasses to customize the appearance of items.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供用于在视图中绘制项目数据并编辑项目模型中的数据的功能的默认实现。提供了QAbstractItemDelegate中定义的paint（）和sizeHint（）虚拟函数的默认实现，以确保委托实现视图期望的正确基本行为。您可以在子类中重新实现这些功能，以自定义项目的外观。

trans-unit.source: This class recognizes the encoding of the data by reading the encoding declaration in the XML file if it finds one, and reading the data using the corresponding encoding. If it does not find an encoding declaration, then it assumes that the data is either in UTF-8 or UTF-16, depending on whether it can find a byte-order mark.
trans-unit.target: 该类通过读取XML文件中的编码声明来识别数据的编码,如果它找到了编码声明,则使用相应的编码读取数据。如果它没有找到编码声明,那么它假设数据是UTF-8或UTF-16,这取决于它是否能找到字节顺序标记。

This clears any existing selection, selects the word at the cursor (i.e. from position() forward), and replaces the selection with the phrase "Hello World".
trans-unit.target: 这将清除所有现有选择，选择光标处的单词（即从位置（）向前），然后将选择替换为短语“ Hello World”。

trans-unit.source: This clock does not overflow.
trans-unit.target: 这个时钟不会溢出。

trans-unit.source: This clock is monotonic and does not overflow.
trans-unit.target: 这个时钟是单调的,不会溢出。

trans-unit.source: This clock type is based on the absolute time presented by Mach kernels, such as that found on macOS. This clock type is presented separately from MonotonicClock since macOS and iOS are also Unix systems and may support a POSIX monotonic clock with values differing from the Mach absolute time.
trans-unit.target: 此时钟类型基于Mach内核提供的绝对时间，例如在macOS上找到的绝对时间。由于macOS和iOS也是Unix系统，并且可以支持POSIX单调时钟，其值与Mach绝对时间不同，因此该时钟类型与MonotonicClock分开提供。

trans-unit.source: This clock type is based on the absolute time presented by Mach kernels, such as that found on macOS. This clock type is presented separately from MonotonicClock since macOS and iOS are also Unix systems and may support a POSIX monotonic clock with values differing from the Mach absolute time.

This clock uses the Windows functions QueryPerformanceCounter and QueryPerformanceFrequency to access the system's high-precision performance counter. Since this counter may not be available on all systems, QElapsedTimer will fall back to the TickCounter clock automatically, if this clock cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: 此时钟使用Windows函数 QueryPerformanceCounter 和 QueryPerformanceFrequency 来访问系统的高精度性能计数器。由于该计数器可能并不适用于所有系统，QElapsedTimer将回落到 TickCounter 自动时钟，如果不能使用该时钟。

trans-unit.source: This closes the window, effectively calling destroy(), and potentially quitting the application. Returns true on success, false if it has a parent window (in which case the top level window should be closed instead).
trans-unit.target: 这将关闭窗口，有效地调用destroy（），并可能退出应用程序。成功返回 true ，如果有父窗口，则返回false（在这种情况下，应关闭顶层窗口）。

trans-unit.source: This code calls a stored procedure called AsciiToInt(), passing it a character through its in parameter, and taking its result in the out parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此代码调用一个称为 AsciiToInt() 的存储过程，通过其in参数向其传递一个字符，并将其结果传递给out参数。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses QState, which inherits QAbstractState. The QState class provides a state that you can use to set properties and invoke methods on QObjects when the state is entered or exited. It also contains convenience functions for adding transitions, e.g., QSignalTransitions as in this example. See the QState class description for further details.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用QState，它继承了QAbstractState。该QState类提供了一个状态，您可以使用设置属性和调用方法上QObject的进入或退出的状态，当s。它还包含用于添加过渡的便捷功能，例如本例中的QSignalTransition。有关更多详细信息，请参见QState类描述。

trans-unit.source: This code makes "Back" a key entry in the translation files. At runtime, the translation system looks up the keyword "Back" and then gets the corresponding translation value for the current system locale. The result is returned to the text property and the user interface will show the appropriate translation of "Back" for the current locale.
trans-unit.target: 此代码使“返回”成为翻译文件中的关键条目。在运行时，翻译系统查找关键字“ Back”，然后获取当前系统区域设置的相应翻译值。结果将返回到 text 属性，并且用户界面将显示当前语言环境的“ Back”的适当翻译。

trans-unit.target: 该组件定义每个单独的次要刻度线。每个小刻度线的位置已经设​​置好；只需要指定隐式宽度和隐式高度。

trans-unit.source: This component defines each section of the pie menu.
trans-unit.target: 该组件定义了饼菜单的每个部分。

trans-unit.source: This component determines if the flickable should reposition itself at the mouse location when clicked.
trans-unit.target: 这个组件决定了当点击时,flickable是否应该重新定位到鼠标的位置。

trans-unit.source: This component is assigned to an entity. When the entity changes distance relative to the camera, the LevelOfDetailSwitch will disable all the child entities except the one matching index currentIndex.
trans-unit.target: 该组件已分配给实体。当实体更改相对于摄像机的距离时，LevelOfDetailSwitch将禁用除一个匹配索引currentIndex之外的所有子实体。

trans-unit.source: This comprises the classes QSqlDriver, QSqlDriverCreator, QSqlDriverCreatorBase, QSqlDriverPlugin, and QSqlResult.
trans-unit.target: 这包括类QSqlDriver，QSqlDriverCreator，QSqlDriverCreatorBase，QSqlDriverPlugin和QSqlResult。

trans-unit.source: This configuration determines the type of CAN bus frames that the current device accepts. The expected value is QList<QCanBusDevice::Filter>. Passing an empty list clears all previously set filters including default filters. For more details see QCanBusDevice::Filter.
trans-unit.target: 此配置确定当前设备接受的CAN总线帧的类型。预期值为 QList<QCanBusDevice::Filter> 。传递空白列表会清除所有先前设置的过滤器，包括默认过滤器。有关更多详细信息，请参见QCanBusDevice :: Filter。

trans-unit.source: This configuration is the most flexible because no dependencies or assumptions are hardcoded about the OpenGL implementation during build time. It allows robust application deployment. When a given environment fails to provide a proper OpenGL 2.0 implementation, it will fall back automatically to ANGLE. This fallback will be completely transparent to the application, and will allow Qt Quick or other OpenGL code to function by translating to Direct3D. Such a fallback could, for example, take place on a Windows 7 PC with no additional graphics drivers installed. On other machines, where there is sufficient OpenGL support, the normal desktop OpenGL drivers will be used. Additionally, pure software-based OpenGL implementations may be available as additional fallbacks in the future, allowing running Qt Quick applications without a GPU.
This constructor can be used to reference media content via network protocols such as HTTP. This may include additional information required to obtain the resource, such as Cookies or HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数可用于通过网络协议(如HTTP)引用媒体内容。这可能包括获取资源所需的附加信息,如Cookies或HTTP头文件。

trans-unit.source: This constructor converts the locale name to a language/country pair; it does not use the system locale database.
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数将locale名称转换为语言/国家对,它不使用系统locale数据库。

trans-unit.source: This constructor finds the relevant serial port among the available ones according to the port name
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数根据端口名在可用的串口中找到相关的串口。

trans-unit.source: This constructor inserts the item into the model of the parent that is passed to the constructor. If the model is sorted then the behavior of the insert is undetermined since the model will call the '<' operator method on the item which, at this point, is not yet constructed. To avoid the undetermined behavior, we recommend not to specify the parent and use QListWidget::insertItem() instead.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数将该项插入到传递给构造函数的父级模型中。如果对模型进行了排序，则插入物的行为不确定，因为模型将在尚未构造的项目上调用 '<' 运算符方法。为避免不确定的行为，建议不要指定父对象，而应使用QListWidget :: insertItem（）。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is convenient for short-lived painters, e.g. in a QWidget::paintEvent() and should be used only once. The constructor calls begin() for you and the QPainter destructor automatically calls end().
trans-unit.target: 这个构造函数对于寿命短的画家很方便，例如在QWidget :: paintEvent（）中，并且只能使用一次。构造函数为您调用begin（），而QPainter析构函数自动调用end（）。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is convenient for short-lived painters, e.g. in a QWidget::paintEvent() and should be used only once. The constructor calls begin() for you and the QPainter destructor automatically calls end().

trans-unit.source: This constructor is required for Low Energy devices on macOS and iOS. CoreBluetooth API hides addresses and provides unique UUIDs to identify a device. This UUID is not the same thing as a service UUID and is required to work later with CoreBluetooth API and discovered devices.
trans-unit.target: macOS和iOS 上的低能耗设备需要此构造函数。CoreBluetooth API隐藏地址并提供唯一的UUID来标识设备。该UUID与服务UUID不同，以后需要与CoreBluetooth API和发现的设备一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor only participates in overload resolution if Char is a compatible character type. The compatible character types are: QChar, ushort, char16_t and (on platforms, such as Windows, where it is a 16-bit type) wchar_t.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Char 是兼容的字符类型，则此构造方法仅参与重载解析。兼容的字符类型为： QChar ， ushort ， char16_t 和（在Windows等平台上，它是16位类型） wchar_t 。

trans-unit.source: This constructor only participates in overload resolution if StdBasicString is an instantiation of std::basic_string with a compatible character type. The compatible character types are: QChar, ushort, char16_t and (on platforms, such as Windows, where it is a 16-bit type) wchar_t.
trans-unit.target: 如果 StdBasicString 是具有兼容字符类型的 std::basic_string 的实例化，则此构造方法仅参与重载解析。兼容的字符类型为： QChar ， ushort ， char16_t 和（在Windows等平台上，它是16位类型） wchar_t 。

trans-unit.source: This data can be extracted through a variety of methods. One of the most well known methods of positioning is GPS (Global Positioning System), a publicly available system that uses radiowave signals received from Earth-orbiting satellites to calculate the precise position and time of the receiver. Another popular method is 'Cell Identifier Positioning', which uses the cell identifier of the cell site that is currently serving the receiving device to calculate its approximate location. These and other positioning methods can all be used with the Location API; the only requirement for a location data source within the API is that it provides a latitude-longitude coordinate with a date/time value, with the option of providing the other attributes listed above.
trans-unit.target: 这种数据可以通过各种方法提取。最著名的定位方法之一是GPS(全球定位系统),这是一个公开的系统,使用从地球轨道卫星接收的无线电波信号来计算接收器的精确位置和时间。另一种流行的方法是 "小区标识符定位",它使用当前为接收设备提供服务的小区站点的小区标识符来计算其大致位置。这些方法和其他定位方法都可以与Location API一起使用;API中对位置数据源的唯一要求是,它必须提供一个带有日期/时间值的经纬度坐标,并可以选择提供上述其他属性。

This data can include the device name, GATT services offered by the device, and so on. The data set via this class will be used when advertising is started by calling QLowEnergyController::startAdvertising(). Objects of this class can represent an Advertising Data packet or a Scan Response packet.

trans-unit.source: This datagram's destination address is not copied if it is an IPv4 address because it is not possible to tell an IPv4 broadcast address apart from a regular IPv4 address without an exhaustive search of all addresses assigned to this machine. Attempting to send a datagram with the sender address equal to the broadcast address is likely to fail. However, this should not affect the communication as network interfaces with multiple IPv4 addresses are uncommon, so the address the operating system will select will likely be one the peer will understand.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个数据报的目的地址是IPv4地址,则不会被复制,因为如果不对分配给这台机器的所有地址进行详尽的搜索,就无法区分IPv4广播地址和普通IPv4地址。试图发送发送者地址等于广播地址的数据报,很可能会失败。不过,这应该不会影响通信,因为具有多个IPv4地址的网络接口并不常见,所以操作系统选择的地址很可能是对等机能够理解的地址。

trans-unit.source: This differs from providing qt_SubRect_<name> uniforms in that the latter allows drawing one or more textures from the atlas in a single ShaderEffect item, while supportsAtlasTextures allows multiple instances of a ShaderEffect component using a different source image from the atlas to be batched in a single draw. Both prevent a texture from being copied out of the atlas when referenced by a ShaderEffect.

trans-unit.source: This document demonstrates two different ways of integrating normal C++ code (that uses Qt) with managed .NET code. First, the manual way is presented, which includes using a thin MC++ wrapper class around the normal Qt/C++ class. Then, the automated way is presented, which utilizes the ActiveQt framework as a generic bridge. The advantage of the first method is that it gives the application developer full control, while the second method requires less coding and relieves the developer of dealing with the conversion between managed and normal data objects.

This document demonstrates two different ways of integrating normal C++ code (that uses Qt) with managed .NET code. First, the manual way is presented, which includes using a thin MC++ wrapper class around the normal Qt/C++ class. Then, the automated way is presented, which utilizes the ActiveQt framework as a generic bridge. The advantage of the first method is that it gives the application developer full control, while the second method requires less coding and relieves the developer of dealing with the conversion between managed and normal data objects.
trans-unit.target: 本文档演示了将普通C ++代码（使用Qt）与托管.NET代码集成的两种不同方式。首先，介绍了手动方式，其中包括在常规Qt / C ++类周围使用瘦MC ++包装器类。然后，提出了一种自动化方法，该方法利用ActiveQt框架作为通用桥梁。第一种方法的优点是它使应用程序开发人员具有完全控制权，而第二种方法需要较少的编码，并减轻了开发人员处理托管数据对象与普通数据对象之间的转换的负担。

trans-unit.source: This document describes the basic drag and drop mechanism and outlines the approach used to enable it in custom controls. Drag and drop operations are also supported by many of Qt's controls, such as the item views and graphics view framework, as well as editing controls for Qt Widgets and Qt Quick. More information about item views and graphics view is available in Using drag and drop with item views and Graphics View Framework.
trans-unit.target: 本文档介绍了基本的拖放机制，并概述了在自定义控件中启用它的方法。 Qt的许多控件（例如项目视图和图形视图框架）以及Qt Widgets和Qt Quick的编辑控件也支持拖放操作。有关在项目视图和图形视图框架中使用拖放的信息，请参见有关项目视图和图形视图的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This document explains how the default scene graph renderer works internally, so that one can write code that uses it in an optimal fashion, both performance and feature-wise.
This document explains how the scene graph renderer for OpenGL works internally so that one can write code that uses it in an optimal fashion, both performance-wise and feature-wise.
trans-unit.target: 本文档解释了OpenGL的场景图渲染器的内部工作原理,以便人们可以编写以最佳方式使用它的代码,无论是从性能上还是从功能上。

trans-unit.source: This does create the underlying OpenGL texture object. Therefore, construction using this constructor does require a valid current OpenGL context.

trans-unit.source: This does not create the underlying OpenGL texture object. Therefore, construction using this constructor does not require a valid current OpenGL context.

trans-unit.source: This does not include this item's own bounding rect; it only returns its descendants' accumulated bounding rect. If you need to include this item's bounding rect, you can add boundingRect() to childrenBoundingRect() using QRectF::operator|().
trans-unit.target: 这不包括该项目自己的边界矩形；它仅返回其后代的累积边界rect。如果需要包括此项的边界矩形，则可以使用QRectF :: operator |（）将boundingRect（）添加到childrenBoundingRect（）。

trans-unit.source: This effect adds a vertical gradient to the whole scene, then additively blends it with all other elements on the layer. Additive blending adds the pixel values of the gradient and the layer, making the result lighter. White areas do not change, and black areas are the same color as the gradient.
This effect adjusts the source item colors separately for each color channel. Source item contrast can be adjusted and color balance altered.
trans-unit.target: 该效果可分别调整源项目的每个颜色通道的颜色。可以调整源项目的对比度并改变色彩平衡。

trans-unit.source: This effect adjusts the source item colors. Brightness adjustment changes the perceived luminance of the source item. Contrast adjustment increases or decreases the color and brightness variations.
trans-unit.target: 该效果可调整源项目的颜色。亮度调整会改变源项目的感知亮度。对比度调整增加或减少颜色和亮度的变化。

trans-unit.source: This effect is intended to have good performance. The shape of the glow is limited to a rectangle with a custom corner radius. For situations where custom shapes are required, consider Glow effect.
trans-unit.target: 该效果旨在具有良好的性能。发光的形状仅限于具有自定义拐角半径的矩形。对于需要自定义形状的情况，请考虑发光效果。

trans-unit.source: This effectively means the model has no elements or attributes of type IDREF.
trans-unit.target: 这实际上意味着该模型没有 IDREF 类型的元素或属性。

trans-unit.source: This effectively means the model has no elements that have an id.
trans-unit.target: 这实际上意味着该模型没有具有id的元素。

trans-unit.source: This element allows to define a list of polylines at once. Each polyline in the list will be preceded by a moveTo command, effectively making each polyline a separate one. The polylines in this list are supposed to be non-intersecting with each other. In any case, when used in conjunction with a ShapePath, the containing ShapePath's ShapePath::fillRule applies. That is, with the default OddEvenFill and non intersecting shapes, the largest shape in the list defines an area to be filled; areas where two shapes overlap are holes; areas where three shapes overlap are filled areas inside holes, etc.
This element allows you to set timed transitions on particle groups.
trans-unit.target: 该元素允许你对粒子组设置定时转换。

trans-unit.source: This element defines the shape of a specified string in a specified font. The text's baseline will be translated to the x and y coordinates, and the outlines from the font will be added to the path accordingly.
This element emits logical particles into the ParticleSystem, with the given starting attributes.
trans-unit.target: 该元素使用给定的起始属性将逻辑粒子发射到ParticleSystem中。

trans-unit.source: This element emits logical particles into the ParticleSystem, with the starting positions based on those of other logical particles.

trans-unit.source: This element models the gravity of a massive object whose center of gravity is far away (and thus the gravitational pull is effectively constant across the scene). To model the gravity of an object near or inside the scene, use PointAttractor.
trans-unit.target: 这个元素可以模拟一个巨大物体的重力,这个物体的重心在很远的地方(因此整个场景的引力实际上是恒定的)。要模拟场景附近或场景内部物体的重力,请使用PointAttractor。

trans-unit.source: This element will accelerate all affected particles to a vector of the specified magnitude in the specified angle. If the angle and acceleration do not vary, it is more efficient to set the specified acceleration on the Emitter.
trans-unit.target: 这个元素将把所有受影响的粒子加速到指定角度的指定大小的矢量。如果角度和加速度没有变化,在发射器上设置指定的加速度会更有效。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the QDesignerTaskMenuExtension class is included in the Qt Designer module, which means, for example, that the class will appear on the list created by calling the \generatelist command with the {classesbymodule QtDesigner} argument.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the appropriate files are copied to the right place and the correct icons are used as required by the Apple App Store. Ad-hoc distributions should also include the following filenames in the application bundle to visualize the application in iTunes:

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the resources are linked into the final application binary in the case of static linking. You should put the initialization code close to where the resources are used in your library, so that clients of your library will only link in the resources if they use the feature of the library that depends on them.
trans-unit.target: 这确保了在静态链接的情况下,资源被链接到最终的应用程序二进制中。你应该把初始化代码放在靠近你的库中使用资源的地方,这样你的库的客户端只有在使用依赖资源的库的功能时,才会把资源链接进去。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that whenever QDoc generates references to entities in the Qt Core module, the base URL is https://doc.qt.io/qt/.
